entry.title: Monday: Chance of light snow. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 08:11 AM CST Monday 02 January 2023
